scripts.test:all: npm run test:functional && npm run test:performance
scripts.test:ci: cypress run --config-file cypress.config.functional.ts --browser chrome --reporter mocha-junit-reporter --reporter-options mochaFile=results/junit/test-results-[hash].xml,testsuitesTitle='Cypress Functional Tests',toConsole=true
scripts.test:ci:performance: cypress run --config-file cypress.config.performance.ts --browser chrome --reporter mocha-junit-reporter --reporter-options mochaFile=results/junit/performance-test-results-[hash].xml,testsuitesTitle='Cypress Performance Tests',toConsole=true
scripts.report:functional: npx mochawesome-merge results/functional/*.json > results/functional/merged-report.json && npx marge results/functional/merged-report.json -f functional-report -o results/functional
scripts.report:performance: npx mochawesome-merge results/performance/*.json > results/performance/merged-report.json && npx marge results/performance/merged-report.json -f performance-report -o results/performance
